short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a context menu to selections with Georgia Tech class numbers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you select text on any webpage, if it contains a full course identifier (like "ME 1770"), right-clicking the selection will add a context menu entry to go straight to the Georgia Tech OSCAR page for the Fall 2016 semester.

If the selection only contains a four-digit number, the context menu entry will lead to a search for all classes with that course number.

The source is freely available: https://github.com/SyntaxBlitz/oscar-menu
